#Cong Target ERS vs. Incong Target ERS Age Group Comparison Stats
options(scipen=999)
datMeltTargetERS$Condition<-as.factor(datMeltTargetERS$Condition)

## Estimate 1 = cong, Estimate 2 = incong
datMeltTargetERStbl<-datMeltTargetERS %>% 
  group_by(ROI,Condition) %>% 
  do(tidy(t.test(dissimCorr~AgeGroup, data=.))) %>%                                   
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 3)) %>% #Round variables to the fourth decimal, and
  select(1,2,4:7,9:11) 

#Manually rename columns for ease of readability
names(datMeltTargetERStbl)[3] <- \avgOAdissimCorr\"
